description: A Goldbug number is an even number 2m for which there exists a subset of the prime non-divisors, P={p1, p2, p3, ..., pk}, of 2m where (2m-p1)*(2m-p2)*(2m-p3)*...*(2m-pk) has only elements of P as factors and one of the pi is between m/2 and m for even m and between (m+1)/2 and m-1 for odd m.
